segments.text: Good morning . I've come here to inquire whether I can get a visa to your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you want to go to US for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been invited to teach Chinese at the University of Hawaii for two years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have a look at your letter of acceptance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's OK . We'll contact you the moment we hear from home .
segments.speaker: S2
